appsgate.lig.enocean.ubikit.adapter.spec
Interface UbikitAdapterService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UbikitAdapter
public interface UbikitAdapterService

This class is a service use to manipulate items from Ubikit EnOcean PEM software layer.

Since:
February 7, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard

validateItem

void validateItem(java.lang.String sensorID,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> capList,
                  boolean doesCapabilitiesHaveToBeSelected)
Validate an item profile for Ubikit EnOcean PEM

Parameters:
sensorID - the item identifier
capList - capabilities for this sensor as an array list
doesCapabilitiesHaveToBeSelected - boolean that is use to know if you need to select one of those capabilities for this sensor
